pr_title: [BEAM-10720] Add implementation for elementwise str methods

timeline.message: Add implementation for trivial elementwise str methods
fixup! Add implementation for trivial elementwise str methods

timeline.author: robertwb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -200,6 +200,15 @@ def update(self, other):
 
   view = frame_base.wont_implement_method('memory sharing semantics')
 
+  @property
+  def str(self):
+    expr = expressions.ComputedExpression(
+        'str',
+        lambda df: df.str, [self._expr],
+        requires_partition_by=partitionings.Nothing(),
+        preserves_partition_by=partitionings.Nothing())

replies.bodyText: Doh yes this is basically an elementwise_method. Good catch
replies.author: TheNeuralBit
